name: La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Fresno Yosemite
description:
Featuring a free hot breakfast, this hotel is just one mile from Club One Casino. Rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV.
Free Wi-Fi is featured in every room at La Quinta Inn Fresno Yosemite. A coffee machine and ironing facilities are provided.
Waffles are featured at the Fresno Yosemite La Quinta Innâ€™s free breakfast. Hot and cold cereal, bread and muffins, fresh fruit, coffee, and juice are also available.
An outdoor pool is included at the hotel. A fitness center is also on site for guest use.
Roeding Park is a 10 minute drive from the La Quinta. William Saroyan Theater is less than a 15 minute walk away.

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Yosemite Area
description:
Located off Highway 41, Days Inn by Wyndham Yosemite Area offers free parking and free WiFi throughout the property. Sequoia National Park is 80 mi away.
Guest rooms include air conditioning, a 50-inch LED TV with cable channels, a microwave, a refrigerator, a coffee machine, a desk and ergonomic chair, and ironing facilities. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and shower.
This pet-friendly hotel offers daily free full hot American breakfast.
Days Inn by Wyndham Yosemite Area is 9.9 mi from the Fresno Airport, as well as 2.5 mi from Fresno State University. Days Inn by Wyndham Yosemite Area is 48 mi away from the breathtaking Yosemite National Park south entrance gates.

name: Quality Inn Fresno Near University
description:
With convenient access to Fresno Yosemite International Airport and Fresno State University, the Quality Inn hotel in Fresno, CA is your hub for business and leisure travel. This Fresno, California hotel is near events like Mardi Gras, Taste of Towner, the Clovis Rodeo and a short drive from the natural wonders of Yosemite National Park, Kings Canyon and Sequoia National Park. Other area attractions include the Discovery Center, the Chaffee Zoo and the Fresno Art Museum.
Guests of the Quality Inn will enjoy the free hot breakfast, free high-speed wireless Internet, free newspaper and free local calls.
All guest rooms offer microwave, cable television, hair dryer, iron and ironing board. Handicap accessible rooms are available as well as some connecting rooms.
For business travelers some rooms offer desks and the hotel offers access to copy and fax services. Nonsmoking rooms are available as well as plenty of parking for cars, trucks and buses.

userReviews.negative: The hotel is huge and really run-down. Looks like it had its hey-day some 20 years ago, in terms of decor and condition. Like many cities today, there's a lot of homelessness and some of the hotel seems to provide shelter for these folks. It seemed like there were some permanent residents on the first floor and hotel guests on the third floor. The hotel provides lots of alerts about security. No staff was visible except for check in and check out. While my room seemed fine, the corridor, the stairs, the grounds all seemed filthy and abandoned by the proprietor. The pool was empty.

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Fresno Yosemite International Airport
description:
Located in Fresno, 5.6 miles from Fresno Convention Center, Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Fresno Yosemite International Airport provides accommodations with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness center. This 3-star hotel offers an ATM and a business center. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, a shared lounge and free WiFi.
At the hotel all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a patio with a pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms will provide guests with a closet and a coffee machine.
The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or American options.
Guests at Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Fresno Yosemite International Airport will be able to enjoy activities in and around Fresno, like hiking, skiing and cycling.
Selland Arena is 5.7 miles from the accommodation, while Blackbeard's Family Entertainment Center is 3.2 miles away. The nearest airport is Fresno Yosemite International Airport, 0.6 miles from Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Fresno Yosemite International Airport.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Fresno North
description:
This hotel is just off Freeway 41 and is 2.5 miles from California State University Fresno. It features a year-round outdoor pool and serves a daily continental breakfast.
Guest rooms at Ramada University Fresno feature cable TV and free Wi-Fi.  Rooms come with a tea and coffee-making facilities, a hair dryer and ironing facilities.
Offering a dinner menu, Sutter Street Bar and Grill is on site at Fresno Ramada University.
A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests to Ramada University Fresno. A business center featuring fax and photocopying services is available. Guests also have access to the on-site fitness center.
The Ramada University is a 12 minute drive from Fresno Yosemite International Airport. The hotel is 6 miles from the Fresno Water Tower Center.

The Fresno also has laundry facilities and vending machines on site.
The Courtyard is less than one mile from Fresno Fashion Fair Shopping Center and the Northgate Shopping Center. Free parking is available.

name: Best Western PLUS Fresno Inn
description:
The Best Western PLUS Fresno Inn is 2 miles from California State University Fresno. This hotel provides a hot tub and rooms include a microwave, small refrigerator and free Wi-Fi.
Guest rooms at the Fresno Best Western PLUS include a 37-inch flat-screen cable TV. Radios and wake up services are available in each room. Select rooms feature a sitting area.
At the Best Western Fresno, guests can swim in the outdoor pool or use the on-site laundry facilities. A business center is also provided.
This Fresno hotel is within walking distance of the Fashion Fair Mall. Many dining options are also a short walk away. The Best Western Inn is near 3 National Parks and the Save Mart Center.

name: Hampton Inn Fresno Airport
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodations, Hampton Inn Fresno Airport is located in Fresno, 5.7 miles from Fresno Convention Center and 5.8 miles from Selland Arena. The property is around 3.1 miles from Blackbeard's Family Entertainment Center, 3.6 miles from Fresno Pacific University and 3.7 miles from Fresno Art Museum. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.
Guest rooms at the hotel include air conditioning and a closet.
Hampton Inn Fresno Airport offers a buffet or American breakfast.
Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Fresno, like hiking and skiing.
St George Greek Orthodox Church is 3.8 miles from Hampton Inn Fresno Airport, while Bulldog Stadium is 6 miles away. The nearest airport is Fresno Yosemite International Airport, a few steps from the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Express Fresno South, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located off Highway 99 and a 5-minute drive from downtown Fresno, California, this hotel is 15 minutes from the Island Water Park. It features a 24-hour gym and free Wi-Fi.
The rooms at this Fresno Holiday Inn Express are decorated in warm colors and furnished with dark hardwood furniture. They are equipped with 39-inch flat-screen TVs and include a microwave, refrigerator, and a large work desk.
Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool and hot tub complete with sun deck and lounge chairs. A hot continental breakfast with eggs, bacon, and fresh fruit is served every morning and laundry facilities are available.
The Fresno Chaffee Zoo is 5 miles from Holiday Inn Express Fresno South. The Fresno Yosemite International Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel.

userReviews.title: Disappointing
userReviews.positive: Both the staff and location were very good. Unfortunately the room itself didn't meet even the modest bar I expect for a Days Inn
userReviews.negative:
This was not a great stay. When I arrived I had to wait a while for someone to show up. The first room I was assigned was supposed to be a non-smoking room (and said Non-smoking) on the door, but had a very strong smell of smoke. That room was largely OK. Unfortunately though, when I returned from dinner the door wouldn't open. The front desk had to get the maintenance man who was off duty to come back to work to open the door. I had to sit around for well over 30 minutes waiting to be let back in the room. Apparently the lock failed and so they ended up having me switch to the room next door. I had quite a bit of stuff I had to move, but at least requiring quite a few trips, but at least it was next door. 
This new room was in worse condition than the other. It also reeked of cigarette smoke, and was pretty worn out. The lampshades were all cut up (how expensive would it be to replace them), wall switch plates broken, hangers broken in half. The bed and pillows were not very comfortable. 
I've stayed in many budget hotels and this was a definite disappointment. I know things happen and while the lock issue was a pain, I can (sort of) forget that. The condition of the room though indicated just poor maintenance though. For the price you can do better. And I really would have expected more from a Days Inn.

name: Best Western Village Inn
description:
Within driving distance of the Yosemite and King Canyon national parks, this centrally located hotel in Fresno, California offers free wireless internet access and daily hot breakfast.
Guests will also enjoy in-room amenities such as air conditioning, a refrigerator, a coffee machine, a TV with cable and satellite channels, and ironing facilities. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer.
Best Western Village Inn features an outdoor pool.
The daily hot breakfast includes locally-sourced seasonal fresh fruit, scrambled eggs, breakfast meat, biscuits and gravy, waffles, bagels, pastries, local breads, oatmeal, cereal, yogurt, a variety of juices and freshly ground coffee.
Attractions such as the Fresno Art Museum and the Fresno Convention Center are only minutes from the Village Inn Best Western. Guests can also explore the nearby Chaffee Zoo or go shopping at the Manchester Center mall, which is right across the street.

address.full: 3110 North Blackstone Avenue, Fresno, CA 93703, United States of America

userReviews.positive:
The hotel and staff were very welcoming.  The rooms were comfortable and quite clean.
The room service was very quick, and the person who brought my meal was pleasant.
userReviews.negative:
Late in the evening, I realized that my iphone charger cord was not working.  Staff members were not able to provide me with a charger.  While I realize that the charger is my responsibility, it seems odd that this type of assistance wasn't available - especially with iphone charging being an issue for many people.  I ended up having to drive 4.5 miles in the late evening through Fresno in order to purchase a new charger cord.  The up note is that the staff members were courteous and helpful.  I just think that emergency chargers should be available.  A note:  my room did not have a clock charger that allows phones to sit on the charger and charge - mine was an old fashioned one that required a charger cord (which was my problem to begin with).
I find it odd that the hotel is charging for bottled water.  I travel quite often, and I found it rather unusual to have to pay for the room water.

description:

The Fresno Chaffee Zoo is 6 miles from Quality Inn & Suites. The Island Waterpark is less than one mile away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fresno
description:
With easy access to major area freeways and close to some of Fresno's main points of interest, this hotel offers comfortable accommodations featuring microwaves and mini-refrigerators.
Guests at the Hampton Inn and Suites Fresno can start the morning with a free daily hot breakfast, or enjoy an energizing workout in the on-site fitness center. The hotel also features many in-room amenities, including free high-speed internet access.
Only a short drive from the Fresno Hampton Inn and Suites, guests can visit Yosemite National Park, the Fresno Fairgrounds and the Fresno Convention Center.  Many recreational activities, including scenic hiking trails and golf courses are also nearby.

name: Garden Inn and Suites Fresno
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Garden Inn and Suites Fresno! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Garden Inn and Suites Fresno is a family-owned hotel located just off Highway 99, next to the California Historic Forestiere Underground Gardens. The hotel offers a continental breakfast and an extensive garden with fruits and flowers.
All air-conditioned rooms feature HDTVs, free wired internet access, a desk, a sitting area, a microwave, a coffee machine, and a refrigerator. All rooms include an private bathroom with a hairdryer. Suites feature a separate living room with sofa and a full-size refrigerator.
Garden Inn and Suites Fresno provides an outdoor pool and a hot tub for guests, along with pool towels and beach chairs. A garden is also available for guests.
Island Waterpark is 1 mi from the Fresno Garden Inn and Suites. Yosemite National Park is 1 hour drive away. California State University at Fresno is 15 mi away.

This hotel is truly an oasis along highway 99; it is quiet, unassuming and gorgeous.  We stay here every time we travel 99.  The married owner/manager couple are a treat, she runs the checkin office and he manages the gardens and rooms.  The managers are polite, friendly and gracious.  Breakfast is a lovely assortment of fresh fruits, muffins and hot/cold drinks.  the Inn is located on the north, quieter side of Fresno but is conveniently close, within a mile, to several good eating places including quick places like In N Out Burgers and MacDonalds.  if you are looking for a pleasant, safe, welcoming place to stay in the Fresno area, I highly recommend the Garden Inn.

This hotel is just minutes away from KFH Medical Center and Kif Garden Golf Course.

description:
This Extended Stay America - Fresno - North is located in Fresno and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi, and a 24-hour front desk.
Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Fresno is equipped with a stove top, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities, and upgraded bedding with extra pillows in every room.
A free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning.
Free weekly housekeeping services are provided and towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk.
The property offers free onsite parking. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Woodward Park, the Edwards Theater / IMAX and the Forestiere Underground Gardens.

name: SpringHill Suites Fresno
description:
SpringHill Suites Fresno features suites with free Wi-Fi and 32-inch flat-screen TVs with HBO. It has an outdoor pool, hot tub and gym and is 8 miles from Fresno Chaffee Zoo.
The spacious suites have kitchenettes with refrigerators, microwaves, silverware and pantries. The suites have wet bars and sofa beds. They also provide iPod docking stations and desks.
SpringHill Suites serves a breakfast buffet and has a 24-hour market with meals and snacks. A business center and meeting rooms are available.
Fresno SpringHill Suites is one mile from River Park Shopping Center and 3 miles from California State University. It is 9 miles from Fresno Yosemite International Airport and 15 miles from Kearney Mansion Museum.

name: Summerfield Inn Fresno Yosemite
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Summerfield Inn Fresno Yosemite! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
This hotel is a 10-minute drive from downtown Fresno. It features an outdoor swimming pool, continental breakfast, business services in the lobby and laundry facilities.
Each room at the Summerfield Inn is equipped with cable TV. Microwaves, coffee-making facilities and refrigerators are also provided. Free WiFi is included.
Fresno Summerfield Inn offers easy access to many area attractions including the Fresno Zoo and the Fresno Convention Center, which are both a 10-minute drive from the hotel. The Shinzen Japanese Gardens are a 5-minute drive from the hotel.
